video.title: Little Lunch
video.synopsis: Adopting a child's perspective, this show takes a humorous look at what happens during those action-packed 15 minutes of snack time each day.

episodes.synopsis: The other kids feel sorry for Rory when he is sent to the principal's office. Battie dresses up as Stretcho, a superhero he has invented.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: While his parents are away, Atticus is coming to school with disgusting lunches made by his grandmother. Tamara refuses to share the monkey bars.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Gonsha rescues a boy from the top of the playground equipment, then gets stuck herself. The kids find their missing items at the lost and found.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Rory tries to keep it a secret when he forgets his lunch. Melanie is caught in the middle when Debra-Jo and Tamara stop speaking to each other.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Tamara wants to play a kissing game with Battie. Melanie finds a possum's head in the sand pit, but it's really just Rory's craft project.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Bored during a rainy lunch, Atticus starts a band and forces Battie to join. Tamara sprains her ankle and can't take the fitness assessment.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Atticus holds a joke-telling competition, but Melanie is terrified to participate. Debra-Jo campaigns to get the old climbing tree chopped down.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Rory invents a ball game, but the rules are much too confusing. Mrs. Gonsha makes a birthday party dish that looks delicious but actually isn't.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Tamara thinks Melanie didn't wash her hands and "germ blocks" her. Battie's grandfather is scheduled to be the guest of honor for Grandparents Day.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Atticus gets jealous when Melanie holds a cake fundraiser to help homeless puppies. The kids must each select a partner for the walk-a-thon.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Gonsha makes the class come inside during a windy lunch period and do yoga instead. Debra-Jo becomes afraid that she might have head lice.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When Rory announces he'd like to be prime minister someday, the class holds a mock election. Rumors swirl when "weird twins" Max and Elsa leave class.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Atticus wants to start a secret club with Rory, but Rory invites everyone to join. Rory is bewildered when he finds out a grade-six girl likes him.
episodes.title: Episode 13
